src.data.types

Class Recipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.data.types.Recipe
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Recipe
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A recipe, consisting of a chef, a list of (amounts of) ingredients, the number of complex ingredients (ie. ingredients that require preparation), and a list of instructions for the dish itself.
    Author:
    ouyangj
    See Also:
